Description:
The future of work is here. See how Windows combines security, adaptability, cloud, and AI to empower organizations and people to create, decide, and grow.

Chapters: 0:00 - Stefan Kennestran introduces 'Agents at Work' and session agenda 00:05:09 - Windows evolves as canvas for AI through three innovation pillars 00:15:07 - Introducing Copilot Plus PCs with improved AI performance and exclusive features 00:16:36 - Demonstration: Semantic Search, Click to Do, and Agent Mode in Excel on Copilot Plus PCs 00:18:03 - AI enhancements in Windows improve accessibility with new 'Fluid Dictation' capability 00:20:15 - Transition to enterprise innovation: AI and cloud integration in Windows 00:26:19 - Overview of Copilot Studio with 3 Million Agents Built 00:29:45 - Showcasing Partner Innovations Using Windows 365 for Agents (e.g., Manus AI) 00:31:23 - Summary: Empowering Users, Developers, and IT with Windows 365 for Agents
Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Agents at Work: Windows Powers the Era of Intelligent Productivity | BRK344
